entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
